name: One Second Hero
description:
One Second?  No Problem!

After all, having only one second to avoid disaster is perfectly achievable-- if you have an inhuman affinity for running really fast!

A prototype made for GMTK Game Jam 2019

This is my twin brother and I's first ever game jam (and itch.io) submission; can't wait to hear constructive feedback!

Controls Reset LevelR
Menu / QuitEscMovementW A S DAimingArrow Keys / MouseInteractEnter / Left Mouse Button
